content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_explorer
--Show the number of types of electric vehicles
SELECT
    electric_vehicle_type,
    COUNT(1) as number_of_vehicle
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://electric-vehicle-data@synapsecourseespdl.dfs.core.windows.net/bronze/vehicle.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    )   WITH (
        
                vehicleTypeId       SMALLINT 8
                
    )     AS vehicle
    JOIN 
       OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_type.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b'
    ) 
    WITH(
        jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS vehicle_type
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH(
        vehicleType SMALLINT,
        electric_vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) '$.electricVehicleType'
    ) 
    ON vehicle.vehicleTypeId  = vehicleType
    GROUP by electric_vehicle_type
    ORDER BY electric_vehicle_type;
